content: पौरुषेय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (यी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [पुरुष-ठञ्] {@--1@} Derived from or belonging to man, human, incidental to man; made, established or propounded by man; as in अपौरुषेया वै वेदाः. {@--2@} Manly, virile. {@--3@} Spiritual. --यः {@--1@} Manslaughter (पुरुषवध). {@--2@} A crowd of men. {@--3@} A day labourer, hireling. {@--4@} Human action, man's work. {@--5@} Law as affecting persons. --यं Human work, action of man.
